Welcome to Center of Mass's documentation!
==========================================

Installation
------------

Please install using ``pip install center_of_mass``

Alternately, the code can be downloaded at: https://github.com/charlotte-lemouel/center_of_mass

Downloads
---------

- :download:`CenterOfMass_estimator_tutorial.ipynb`
- :download:`kinematic_CenterOfMass_tutorial.ipynb`
